betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Usually you get §cLeather§r by killing Cows but there are other ways to obtain Leather, namely through transforming §4Rotten Flesh§r.

You can either use the §6Atomic Reconstructor§r from Actually Additions, or
use the §bAlchemical Furnace (Freezing)§r from FullThrottle Alchemist.

Both methods require some setup in their respective mods, so have a look at the other quest chapters for some guidance.
